MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Sisson Brook Project in North America dated June 2008

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Sisson Brook Project in North America dated June 2008
document.description: The report provides technical details and resource estimates for the Sisson Brook Zone III tungsten-molybdenum deposit located in New Brunswick, Canada, compliant with NI 43-101 standards.
